config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration code checks if the 'KEY_LANGUAGE' is present in the 'hints' map of the SVGAbstractTranscoder class. If it is present, it returns the value associated with 'KEY_LANGUAGE', otherwise it falls back to the default language 'en' (english) by calling the super class method 'getLanguages()'.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered whenever the 'getLanguages()' method is called in the system. The frequency of triggering depends on how often this method is invoked in the codebase.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of this configuration option is related to the language used for transcoding. It affects the output language of the transcoded content. If the specified language is not found in the 'hints' map, the default language 'en' will be used.
